root.message: The OTHER_DOC field for indicator 3-4-1, translated into fr
root.data:
Références

URL :

http://www.who.int/gho/en/

Références:

NCD Global Monitoring Framework: Indicator Definitions and Specifications. Genève : Organisation mondiale de la santé, 2014 (http://www.who.int/nmh/ncd-tools/indicators/GMF_Indicator_Definitions_FinalNOV2014.pdf?ua=1)

Définition de l'indicateur de l'OMS (http://apps.who.int/gho/indicatorregistry/App_Main/view_indicator.aspx?iid=3354)

WHO methods and data sources for global causes of death. 2000-2015. Genève: Organisation mondiale de la santé, 2017.

(http://www.who.int/healthinfo/global_burden_disease/GlobalCOD_method_2000_2015.pdf)

Résolution de l'Assemblée mondiale de la santé, WHA66.10 (2014) : Follow-up to the Political Declarations of the High-level Meeting of the General Assembly on the Prevention and Control of Non-communicable Diseases. Y compris l'annexe 2 : Comprehensive global monitoring Framework, inclunding 25 indicators, and a set of nine voluntary global targets for the prevention and control ofnoncommunicable diseases. Genève: Organisation mondiale dela santé, 2014 (http://apps.who.int/gb/ebwha/pdf_files/WHA66/A66_R10-en.pdf?ua=1)

Global Action PLan for the Prevention and Contril of NCDs 2013-2020. Genève : Organisation mondiale de la santé, 2013 (http://apps.who.int/iris/bitstream/10665/94384/1/9789241506236_eng.pdf?ua=1)
